means: （用腐蚀性物质或烙铁）烧灼以消毒

sentence.Network_en: Laser beams may cauterize and heal ulcers.
sentence.Network_cn: 激光束可以烧灼和愈合溃疡.

sentence.Network_en: Lasers cauterize incisions , reducing bleeding and infection, sealing off nerve endings, and minimizing postoperative pain.
sentence.Network_cn: 激光可以麻痹伤口, 减少流血和感染, 封闭神经末梢, 将术后痛苦降低至最小.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... singe v． （轻微地）烧焦，烫焦 cauterize vt 烧灼,使麻木不仁 | scald v． 烫，用沸水消毒n．烫伤.
《GMAT600分词汇》第一课 ... caustic a.刻薄的 cauterize v.烧灼；腐蚀 cavalier a.漫不经心的；随便的.
Clarke的意思中文翻译 ... cauterization 烧灼, 腐蚀 cauterize 烧灼, 烙, 使麻木不仁 cautery 烧灼, 烧灼物, 腐蚀.
《亡者之夜》II&nbsp;&nbsp;兵种介绍... ... Blood Transfusion 输血 [ V ] 35 Cauterize 止血 [ C ] 35 Mend 矫正 [ E ] 35.

YAP laser cauterization treatment of dry socket ., YAP 激光烧灼治疗干槽症.

objective : to evaluate the effect of immunosuppressant rapamycin on corneal neovascularization ( CNV ) of the rabbits by alkali cauterization , and compare the effect of dexamethasone .目的：验证新型免疫抑制剂雷帕霉素对碱烧伤诱导兔角膜新生血管的影响，并与地塞米松相比较。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French cauteriser, from late Latin cauterizare, from Greek kautēriazein, from kautērion 'branding iron', from kaiein 'to burn'

entry.tran: (用高温或化学物质)烙，烧灼(伤口)
entry.def: If a doctor cauterizes a wound, he or she burns it with heat or with a chemical in order to close it up and prevent it from becoming infected.

example.ex: He cauterized the wound with a piece of red-hot iron.
example.tran: 他用一块烧红的烙铁烧灼伤口。

means.word_mean: 1. burn, sear, or freeze (tissue) using a hot iron or electric current or a caustic agent;
2. make insensitive or callous; deaden feelings or morals

auth_sentence.content: There is also an option to cauterize or laser the warts, or to freeze them off with liquid nitrogen.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also an option to cauterize or laser the warts, or to freeze them off with liquid nitrogen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also an option to cauterize or laser the warts, or to freeze them off with liquid nitrogen.
